thread.title: Self-driving cars could put 2 million people with disabilities to work, save $1.3 trillion each year
thread.title_full: Self-driving cars could put 2 million people with disabilities to work, save $1.3 trillion each year

author: Richard Read (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: Self-driving cars could put 2 million people with disabilities to work, save $1.3 trillion each year
text: Motorists of all ages are concerned about self-driving cars. Uber and Lyft drivers are worried about losing their jobs, while others simply doubt that computers can drive as well as humans. (Fun fact: they can. And how.) But what's often left out of discussions around autonomous vehicles are the benefits they'll offer to people with disabilities...
